survey_name: User Preferences for Virtual Reality Fitness Applications Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on consumer preferences and experiences with virtual reality (VR) fitness applications to guide future product development and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: Have you ever used a virtual reality (VR) fitness application?
answer_options: Yes, regularly (at least once a week)
Yes, occasionally (less than once a week)
No, but I am interested in trying
No, and I am not interested
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment users and non-users for further analysis. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for easy selection.
